name: Mercusuram
description: IGI Game Jam 2025 is a game jam held by University of Indonesia with this year's theme "Purpose in the Unknown". My game is about a lighthouse (meaning mercusuar in Indonesia) that must shine it's light towards incoming ship preventing them from crashing into the island. The game submitted for the competition has a lot of bugs and implemented features since the it happens at the same time with GMTK's Game Jam meaning I only have 15 hours working on this game. After the jam ended I fixed the bugs and implement more features such as tutorial screen, audio, even more obstacles like sharks and tornadoes.

name: QQ Joker
description: GMTK Game Jam is an international annual game jam held by the youtuber Game Maker's Toolkit. With this year's theme "Loop" I joined a random team through the discord server and made a card game where players must loop through the deck. Players can swap cards between baord and hand, when all cards on board matches their suit, they are discarded.

name: SEA Catering
description: Catering web app with full dashboard for both members and full monitoring by admin.

name: (Not) Space Invaders
description: A clone of the popular game Space Invader created in Java using Java GUI.

name: Wasteless
description: Web based application as a bridge between students and canteen staff to reduce canteen food waste. Students can order food in advance, gave feedbacks, and even suggest new menus. Staffs can monitor which menu are popular, amount of orders to prepare.

name: SIPUTIH
description: WebGIS based platform to monitor traffic in Keputih, Surabaya, Indonesia.

name: Rajawali Holdings Indonesia
description: Created a responsive frontend for the company's profile website, ensuring a seamless user experience across all devices.

name: SIMPENAN | Sistem Informasi Media Penting dan Aman
description: For my Information Security course, we are required to implement a symmetric and asymmetric encryption for users to store files and send encrypted files

name: Alpro x Three.js
description: For Computer Graphics course final project, we created a 3d render of the Algorithms and Programming Laboratory using Three.js.

description: Used for Schematics ITS 2024, the game is inspired from the infamous "Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes."

name: Box of Curiosity
description: We created a game that were played with over 1000 participants online for the Schematics 2024 Event."

name: Minesweeper
description: For my Design & Analysis of Algorithms course, I chose to create a game of minesweeper which applies the Breadth First Search algorithm when revealing cells that does not have a mine in it. Kind of proud of this one since I already know the basic and just needed a bit help from GPT for minor syntax stuffs.

name: Checkers
description: Just a replication of a checkers game. Unfortunately it is a bit difficult to put it on the web so I am sorry about the aspect ratio

name: FoodGrub
description: Simple point of Sales application for F&B business. Business owner can perform CRUD to menus, create and track order, as well as to filter order based on dates.

description: Used for Schematics ITS 2023, the game is inspired from the infamous "Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes"

name: Escape Card
description: Online game played by over 1000 people that is used for Schematics ITS 2023. Players must gather clues and solve logic puzzles to find the treasure.

name: StudyKanji
description: Personal project to help me and my friends learn Japanese Kanji. Not optimized for desktop

name: ServiceHub
description: Created a prototype for a home service provider for Concept of Software Development class.
